https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null «Ragtag» - in the sense of impenetrable, a colorful mixture - is the title of a joint work by Billy Roisz (visuals) and Toshimaru Nakamura (sound) which was created under the project name AVVA after a 2004 tour in England. AVVA:RAGTAG
